channel.title: Comments on: Melody Day covered by Of Montreal

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I feel kinda guilty for liking their covers more than their songs.
item.content:encoded: I feel kinda guilty for liking their covers more than their songs.

item.title: By: Arthur Seaton
item.dc:creator: Arthur Seaton
item.description: Thanks for that link to the Of Montreal archive. I think they played a Bowie cover to end the show in Columbia...I think.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for that link to the Of Montreal archive. I think they played a Bowie cover to end the show in Columbia…I think.
